user_query: I want to organize a golf tournament for my company. Could you fetch the course details of Pebble Beach Golf Links and provide me with the formatted address, phone number, rating, and website? Moreover, I need the list of teams that have participated in the NCAA Final Four sorted alphabetically.

TaskList.description: Fetch the course details of Pebble Beach Golf Links including formatted address, phone number, rating, and website.
Retrieve the list of teams that have participated in the NCAA Final Four.
Sort the list of teams from the NCAA Final Four alphabetically.
